rules.description: Caps Lock → Hyper Key (⌃⌥⇧⌘) | Escape if alone
escape = capslock switch
SpaceFN: Space enables SpaceFN mode
SpaceFN: Space+b to Space (hold to repeat)
SpaceFN: Space+[1234567890-=] to F[1-12]
SpaceFN: Space+Backspace to Forward Delete
SpaceFN: Space+p to screenshot.app
SpaceFN: Space+[hjkl] to Left, Down, Up, Right
SpaceFN: Space+y to Beginning of line, Space+o to End of line
SpaceFN: Space+i to Page Up, Space+u to Page Down
SpaceFN: Space+n to Left one word, Space+. to Right one word
SpaceFN: Space+[ijkl] to Up, Left, Down, Right
SpaceFN: Space+, to Down
SpaceFN: Space+u to Home, Space+o to End
SpaceFN: Space+y to Page Up, Space+n to Page Down
SpaceFN: Space+h to Left one word, Space+; to Right one word
SpaceFN: Disable SpaceFN mode after last typing
